author: Universal Pictures
description:
Jack Foley (George Clooney) and Karen Sisco (Jennifer Lopez) steal a few quiet minutes in a dim bar, wondering what might’ve been if they weren’t on opposite sides of the law.

Buy/Rent Out of Sight!

Synopsis:
A charming, professional bank robber breaks out of prison, only to find himself in a tense, sizzling game of cat-and-mouse with the beautiful Federal Marshal he briefly took hostage.
